mapper.select: SELECT * from MAUSYSTEMDATA where SYSTEMTYPE = #{SYSTEMTYPE} and SYSTEMNAME = #{SYSTEMNAME} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAUSYSTEMDATA (SYSTEMTYPE, SYSTEMNAME, STATUS, TEMPERATURE, DEWPOINT, DATADATE, CREATEDATE) VALUES (#{SYSTEMTYPE},#{SYSTEMNAME},#{STATUS},#{TEMPERATURE},#{DEWPOINT},#{DATADATE},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE MAUSYSTEMDATA SET STATUS = #{STATUS} , TEMPERATURE = #{TEMPERATURE}, DEWPOINT = #{DEWPOINT}, CREATEDATE = sysdate WHERE SYSTEMTYPE = #{SYSTEMTYPE} and SYSTEMNAME = #{SYSTEMNAME} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
